original_text: They shall also bring up a company against thee, and they shall stone thee with stones, and thrust thee through with their swords.
korean_text: 무리를 데리고 와서 너를 돌로 치며 칼로 찌르며

sentences.original_text: They shall also bring up a company against thee
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 또한 너를 대적하는 무리를 끌어 올리리라

sentences.original_text: and they shall stone thee with stones
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 돌로 너를 돌로 칠 것이며

sentences.original_text: and thrust thee through with their swords
